entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
